statements: SELECT * FROM SalesDataFashionCollection
SELECT sale_id, collection_name, designer_name, total_sales FROM SalesDataFashionCollection
SELECT collection_name, designer_name, sale_date FROM SalesDataFashionCollection
SELECT * FROM SalesDataFashionCollection ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT collection_name, total_sales FROM SalesDataFashionCollection WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM SalesDataFashionCollection WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT collection_name, designer_name, total_sales FROM SalesDataFashionCollection WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT sale_id, collection_name, designer_name, total_sales FROM SalesDataFashionCollection WHERE designer_name = 'Louis Vuitton'
SELECT sale_id, collection_name, total_sales FROM SalesDataFashionCollection WHERE total_sales BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY collection_name ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesDataFashionCollection WHERE sale_date >= '2022-04-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM fashion_collections;
SELECT collection_name, designer_name, year FROM fashion_collections;
SELECT collection_id, design_name FROM fashion_collections WHERE year=2021;
SELECT collection_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM fashion_collections JOIN sales_data ON fashion_collections.collection_id = sales_data.collection_id;
SELECT designer_name, sale_amount FROM fashion_collections JOIN sales_data ON fashion_collections.collection_id = sales_data.collection_id WHERE sale_date = '2021-11-10';
SELECT * FROM fashion_collections WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY collection_name ASC;
SELECT collection_name, year FROM fashion_collections WHERE designer_name = 'Chanel';
SELECT collection_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY collection_id HAVING total_sales > 5;
SELECT fc.collection_name, sd.sale_amount FROM fashion_collections fc JOIN sales_data sd ON fc.collection_id = sd.collection_id WHERE sd.sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sd.sale_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS highest_sale FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT collection_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialization FROM FashionDesigners WHERE designer_experience > 5 ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_season FROM FashionTrends WHERE trend_season = 'Summer';
SELECT sale_id, collection_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE collection_name LIKE '%Spring%';
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, collection_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_season FROM FashionTrends WHERE trend_season = 'Summer';
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialization, designer_experience FROM FashionDesigners WHERE designer_experience > 5 ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, collection_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM FashionCollections;
SELECT collection_name, designer_name FROM FashionCollections ORDER BY collection_name DESC, designer_name ASC;
SELECT collection_name, design_theme, launch_date FROM FashionCollections WHERE designer_name = 'Chanel';
SELECT collection_name, launch_date FROM FashionCollections WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData JOIN FashionCollections ON SalesData.collection_id = FashionCollections.collection_id;
SELECT * FROM FashionCollections;
SELECT collection_name, designer_name, design_theme FROM FashionCollections WHERE designer_name = 'Chanel';
SELECT collection_name, launch_date FROM FashionCollections WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT collection_name, sale_amount FROM FashionCollections JOIN SalesData ON FashionCollections.collection_id = SalesData.collection_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT show_date, location FROM FashionShows ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Collection;
SELECT collection_name, designer_name FROM Collection ORDER BY collection_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM ClothingItem WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT pr.customer_id, pr.item_id, cr.collection_name, ps.quantity, ps.total_price FROM PurchaseRecord pr JOIN ClothingItem cr ON pr.item_id = cr.item_id JOIN SalesRecord ps ON pr.item_id = ps.item_id ORDER BY pr.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Collection;
SELECT collection_name, designer_name, launch_date FROM Collection ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT c.collection_name, ci.item_name, ci.category, ci.price FROM Collection c INNER JOIN ClothingItem ci ON c.collection_id = ci.collection_id WHERE ci.category = 'Shirt';

SELECT pr.purchase_id, c.customer_name, ci.item_name, pr.purchase_date FROM PurchaseRecord pr INNER JOIN Customer c ON pr.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN ClothingItem ci ON pr.item_id = ci.item_id;
SELECT s.record_id, ci.item_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity, s.total_price FROM SalesRecord s INNER JOIN ClothingItem ci ON s.item_id = ci.item_id WHERE s.quantity > 5 ORDER BY s.total_price DESC;
